Html: I'm building app using MVVM pattern and I've got collection of RibbonTabs in my MainWindowViewModel. How can I bind in xaml this collection to Tabs in ribbon (there's no dependency property Tabs)?

Why are you defining the tab in ViewModel? Isn't that a "presentation" concern?
ViewModel shouln't define how something looks like. Instead, it should contain interaction logic and UI's state.

We have it put like that:
 - Tabs and ribbons are declared in xaml. That's the View part.
 - Commands are forwarded to ViewModels for execution.

How to forward a RibbonCommand to other command is another question.
Take a look at the Southridge application: http://blogs.msdn.com/jaimer/archive/2009/02/10/m-v-vm-training-day-sample-application-and-decks.aspx
